reviewText: This is a wonderful workout for both the seasoned exerciser and anyone who must be restricted to working out from a chair.  Both versions are explained and shown in this video.

My husband and I have used this video for 4 years and never tire of it.  When my friend was having trouble getting to her exercise classes, I purchased her a video for her birthday. She too loves it.
Broken into segments - upper body, lower body, warm ups etc. - different levels of exercise. It was recommended to us by our Berkeley Heart Lab Dietitian. That says a lot.
